settings.greeting_message: 👋  Good day! Please holler at us if you have questions.  We’re here and happy to help!

custom_css: th,.size-guide tr td:first-child {opacity: 1; text-align: center; background-color: #262f4d; color: white; font-weight: bold; vertical-align: middle; padding: 1rem; font-size: 1rem;}
.customer-account-overview th {opacity: 1; text-align: left; background-color: #262f4d; color: #fff; vertical-align: middle; padding: 0.5rem; font-size: 0.75rem;}
